MC2Point Class Reference

Planar point, name MC2Point is chosen as it does not exist in WIN32. More...

  • coord_t y
    This should be private, really. Use getY instead.

Detailed Description

Planar point, name MC2Point is chosen as it does not exist in WIN32.
